changelog.zh:
- 新增：频道卡片长频道名称自动滚动显示（Windows鼠标悬停/TV焦点时触发）
- 新增：多屏播放频道名称显示开关设置（默认关闭）
- 修复：多屏播放频道名称显示设置在TV端和Windows端的生效问题
- 修复：从单屏长按OK进入分屏时使用旧设置值的问题
- 优化：TV端侧边栏菜单焦点导航，边界处停止不循环
changelog.en:
- Added: Auto-scroll for long channel names on channel cards (triggered by mouse hover on Windows / focus on TV)
- Added: Toggle setting for multi-screen channel name display (default off)
- Fixed: Multi-screen channel name display setting not working on TV and Windows
- Fixed: Using old setting value when entering multi-screen from single player with long press OK
- Optimized: TV sidebar menu focus navigation, stops at boundaries without looping
